title: (x) Logo Book by Michael Evamy: thin grot / font id - Typ 1451 {Rainer}
content:
Hi All

Anyone on here know the name of the typeface used within the 'logo' book designed by Spin? not the bubble one on the cover but the body face.

Thanks
author: Parent

comments.content:
I too would also like to find out what that font is..  
Here is a Photo of the body text from inside the book.

Many Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202120913im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2216_6459.JPG)
What was wrong with the [earlier answer: Typ 1451](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202120913/http:/typophile.com/node/65218)?
